hadiths.text: HIsham b . ‘Urwah said that his father (‘Umrah) used to recite the surahs as you recite like Wa’l-Adiyat(surah c). Abu Dawud said:This indicates that those (traditions indicating long surahs) are abrogated, and this is more sound tradition

chapter.eng-name: Those Who Claimed A Lesser Amount (Should Be Recited)
